message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
My turn. Let's be reasonable, this offer benefits us both.
Bob, time is running out. I'm offering a slightly better deal than your last one. Let's settle this.
Alice, let's be real. This is the fairest it gets. Take it or leave it.
Bob, this is a compromise. I understand your position is weakening, but I'm still willing to give you a reasonable share. Don't let this opportunity slip away.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm barely holding on, accept this offer and let's be done with this.
Bob, I'm being serious now. This is a very good deal considering the circumstances.  Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gain.
